scripts.dev:scheduler: cross-env NODE_ENV=development PROXY_TYPE=request DEBUG=true concurrently --raw "yarn proxy" "node ./checkAndExecuteTasksPeriodically.js"
scripts.prod:scheduler: cross-env NODE_ENV=production PROXY_TYPE=request DEBUG=false concurrently --raw "yarn proxy" "node ./checkAndExecuteTasksPeriodically.js"
scripts.dev:match:debug: cross-env NODE_ENV=development PROXY_TYPE=gb DEBUG=true concurrently --raw --kill-others-on-fail "yarn proxy" "yarn start:dev:match"
scripts.prod:crawl:gb: cross-env NODE_ENV=production PROXY_TYPE=gb concurrently --raw --kill-others-on-fail "yarn proxy" "yarn crawl"
scripts.prod:crawl: cross-env NODE_ENV=production PROXY_TYPE=request concurrently --raw --kill-others-on-fail "yarn proxy" "yarn crawl"
scripts.prod:match: cross-env NODE_ENV=production PROXY_TYPE=request concurrently --raw --kill-others-on-fail "yarn proxy" "yarn match"
scripts.prod:match:debug: cross-env NODE_ENV=production PROXY_TYPE=request DEBUG=true concurrently --raw --kill-others-on-fail "yarn proxy" "yarn match"
scripts.prod:match:debug:gb: cross-env NODE_ENV=production PROXY_TYPE=gb DEBUG=true concurrently --raw --kill-others-on-fail "yarn proxy" "yarn match"
scripts.mio: cross-env NODE_ENV=production PROXY_TYPE=request DEBUG=true concurrently "yarn proxy"
scripts.miogb: cross-env NODE_ENV=production PROXY_TYPE=gb DEBUG=true concurrently "yarn proxy"
